description: The Au Coin Bio initiative focuses on promoting organic produce at the March√© des Enfants Rouges in Paris, a historic market. As an initiative that was been managed by mother and daughter, the project emphasizes family values and sustainable practices. With a commitment to pesticide-free products, Aucoin Bio has become a local staple, attracting both residents and tourists. The initiative not only supports local agriculture but also fosters strong community relationships through its organic stands and catering services.
name: Au Coin Bio
